title: How is this Yasuo Windwall Bug still not fixed?

embed.description: Open me! ლ(́◉◞౪◟◉‵ლ Just a quick bug i wanted to show everyone - - - - - Social Network: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Sakuritou/ - - - - - Thanks for watching! (●´ω｀●) ❤

body:
So basically sometimes when you throw out your windwall the already existing projectiles will go through.

It's not like im a Yasuo Main but i can understand that Yasuo Mains are completly annoyed by this.

Also.. How is this still not fixed?

**_I attached a Video of me talking about the Bug and showing it ingame if you are interested._**

Yours sincerly

Sakuritou


{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: this bug has been around for at least a month now. I have seen multiple threads about it and riot doesnt do anything. I really just want them to fix it.

How is it not fixed? Like this:

_does nothing_

:P

For real, though, this is a pretty critical bug on a frequently-picked champion. It's been like this for a while, too.
fix the bug, and in the same patch, fix the wall's hitbox
